title: Emerald Polki Jhumka - "Paccha Patla Bottu"
materials: Pearls. Features a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish.
features: Classic Jhumka silhouette with a floral top. Adorned with uncut Polki diamonds in a closed setting, creating a timeless antique look. The 'Patla' or layers, features emerald bead dangles for a touch of color and movement. The floral design with a central Polki enhances the ethnic appeal. The traditional design is elevated with modern touches.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to showcase a touch of South Indian heritage.
description: Handcrafted by skilled artisans, this Jhumka embodies timeless elegance. The use of uncut Polki diamonds adds a unique, antique charm, reflecting the grandeur of Hyderabad's rich jewelry heritage. The combination of emeralds and pearls complements the gold, creating a visually stunning piece. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine and luster, making it a valuable investment.
